errors.cause: General authentication failure. The client did not correctly sign the request. Consult the signing documentation
Example: The expected value did not match what was stored in the system
The signature in the request did not include all of the required components. See HTTP Header Contents
errors.message: The request signature does not conform to AWS standards

errors.cause: For a table with a local secondary index, a group of items with the same hash key has exceeded the maximum size limit of 10 GB. For more information on item collections, see Item Collections

Example: The number of concurrent table requests (cumulative number of tables in the CREATING, DELETING or UPDATING state) exceeds the maximum allowed of 10. The total limit of tables (currently in the ACTIVE state) is 250
errors.message: Too many operations for a given subscriber

errors.cause: The request did not include the required x-amz-security-token. See Making HTTP Requests to DynamoDB
errors.message: Request must contain a valid (registered) AWS Access Key ID

errors.cause: Example: Your request rate is too high. The AWS SDKs for DynamoDB automatically retry requests that receive this exception. Your request is eventually successful, unless your retry queue is too large to finish. Reduce the frequency of requests, using Error Retries and Exponential Backoff. Or, see Specifying Read and Write Requirements for Tables for other strategies
errors.message: You exceeded your maximum allowed provisioned throughput for a table or for one or more global secondary indexes. To view performance metrics for provisioned throughput vs. consumed throughput, go to the Amazon CloudWatch console

errors.cause: Example: You tried to recreate an existing table, or delete a table currently in the CREATING state
errors.message: The resource which you are attempting to change is in use

errors.cause: Example: Table which is being requested does not exist, or is too early in the CREATING state
This can be returned by the control plane API (CreateTable, DescribeTable, etc) when they are requested too rapidly
errors.message: Rate of requests exceeds the allowed throughput

errors.cause: The request signature is incorrect. The most likely cause is an invalid AWS access key ID or secret key
errors.message: The Access Key ID or security token is invalid

errors.cause: This error can occur for several reasons, such as a required parameter that is missing, a value that is out range, or mismatched data types. The error message contains details about the specific part of the request that caused the error
errors.message: The request could not be processed

errors.cause: Maximum request size of 1 MB exceeded
The server encountered an error while processing your request
errors.message: The server encountered an internal error trying to fulfill the request

errors.cause: The server encountered an error while processing your request
errors.message: The server encountered an internal error trying to fulfill the request

errors.cause: There was an unexpected error on the server while processing your request
errors.message: The service is currently unavailable or busy
